author: remm
msg: - 41057: Caching large strings uses too much memory and is a bit pointless, so add an upper bound to the String length.

author: mprudhom
msg: Changed syncWithManagedTransaction to return true if a transaction is already active (rather than throwing an exception), since section 5.9.2 of the JPA spec suggests that it should be legal to invoke EntityManager.joinTransaction() multiple times.
